title: testing/script: API
body:
Delete whole package.

It was written to test crypto/tls, when that package was using goroutines a bit more
heavily than it should have been.  The tls got rewritten and is now simpler, and does
not use this package for its tests.  Nothing else does either, and I think using the
package is approximately as hard as writing such a test by hand.  We can always bring it
back if we need to.
